name: VSCode FitNesse
description: Extension used to interact FitNesse tests from Visual Studio Code. Formats, runs tests and provides syntax highlighting.

name: Personal Website
description: Website built with Gatsby, React and GraphQL. Contains my blog, projects and online resume.

name: FitNesse Format
description: NPM package to format a string the same as the FitNesse client would.

name: Card Shuffling
description: A simple web application to deal cards to players.
